description:
Miss Monochrome painstakingly practices for her first live tour. She demonstrates her status as an out-of-place artifact by having Ru-chan install a program within her and performing a brand-new dance perfectly her very first time. While a new program is installing, Promoter Yayoi carelessly pulls out her USB cable. Miss Monochrome freezes up, and her behavior becomes very peculiar...
Source: crunchyroll
